title: Automated Phishing/Scam Detection
description: Cardano giveaway scams are on the rise, with of users losing millions of USD via these scams. We need scalable ways of defending users.
solution: We propose a scalable system for the automated monitoring, detection, and reporting of new Cardano giveaway scams, as they arise.
experience:
PI: Cybersecurity researcher, experience in identifying/tackling malicious content.

Co-PI: Stake-pool operator, Cardano Podcaster, Web dev.
